title: Putumayo presents: Congo to Cuba (2002)
description:
Ã¢â‚¬Å“Congo to CubaÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ (2002) examines the connection between modern African music and Cuban styles that evolved from a slow-simmering cross-pollination of Spanish melodies and rhythms imported by homesick slaves.
 
When Latin albums eventually found their way home to the Continent, local musicians immediately recognized the link and re-Africanized the tunes for their own markets. These versions then traveled back to the Caribbean, resealing the cultural circle and launching dozens of further permutations.

This well-composed compilation shows how much Africa and Cuba have in common. 
It's a transatlantic journey - but you won't get seasick on this.



Various Artists

Putumayo presents: Congo to Cuba

2002



  CD / 2002 / 320Kbps
